Detailed Description

Higgs scalar field equation, using multipole expansion.

Assumed spacetime: warped product of a 2 dimensional Lorentz spacetime and 2 dimensional unit sphere. Coordinates in the first manifold: tau, rho. Coordinates in the second manifold: theta, phi. Scalar field: F.

Version:
0.5, 03/29/2007
Since:
GridRipper 0.5, 03/29/2007
Author:
Andras Laszlo
